text: Vasili Aleksandrovich Slobodko (; born 18 June 1973) is a former Russian football player. ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Sportspeople from Bryansk Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Krylia Sovetov Samara players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Luch Vladivostok players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players Category:FC Dynamo Bryansk players
title: Vasili Slobodko
